name: Will Hurd
summary: Former CIA officer and Republican Congressman who called Trump 'a lawless, selfish, failed politician' and ran against him in the 2024 GOP primary.

keyStatements.quote: Donald Trump is a lawless, selfish, failed politician.
I will not support Donald Trump. He's not fit to be president.
Trump is running to stay out of prison, not to make America great.

timeline.significance: Worked in cybersecurity and Middle East

credibility.background: Former CIA operations officer, U.S. Representative, cybersecurity expert

oppositionReasons: Trump is lawless, selfish, and failed
Trump is not fit to be president
Trump is running to stay out of prison
endorsement: Refuses to support Trump; ran against him in 2024 primary

sources.title: Will Hurd calls Trump lawless and selfish
List of Republicans who oppose Donald Trump's 2024 presidential campaign
